django.contrib.gis.ptr
======================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.ptr


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.ptr.CPointerBase


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: CPointerBase

   Base class for objects that have a pointer access property
   that controls access to the underlying C pointer.


   .. py:attribute:: ptr_type


   .. py:attribute:: destructor
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: null_ptr_exception_class


   .. py:property:: ptr
